Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Hellplague:
 
The femme s carried Malice into the medical bay and laid him on a table.  Due to the beast shell halves and the tail on his back, he lay lop sided.  Hellplague activated a panel at one end of the table, and plexiglass plates slid into place around the edges of the table.  Then a clear gel filled the container, it waqs thick enough to raise Malice clear of the table and float in the jel.  After a moment or two, the container was completely filled, and Malice was suspended inside.  The Sweep commander moved to a console nearby and activated it.  A large crane arm came out of the ceiling and positioned itself over the tank.  Hellplague hit a button and a countdown appeared on the monitor, signifiying that the tools on the crane arm had to calibrate before using them.  Hellplague stepped beside Blacknightmare and looked at the bounty hunter in the tank.
"Are you sure nothing strange? Nothing happened before he shut down?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare:

BlackNightmare didn't protested and helped her

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC: Just sent it.
>  
> Hellplague:
>  
> "What do you mean?!?  I activated the sensor probes and he just 
shut down?  Nice excuse."
> Hellplague knelt over Malice and inspected the unpowered bot.  
> "Very strange.  A rare find.  Help me carry him over to the 
medical lab.  We can use the scanning table there." she said as she 
picked up Malice's arms and waited for Blacknightmare to grab his 
legs and carry him into the lab.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC:No yet can you sent it again?
> 
> "I didn't nothing"replied the femme
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Hellplague:
> >  
> > Malice looks up at the femme supposed to be guarding him.
> > "How do you stand her?  Is she generally this annoying?" he 
> asked.  
> > He was trully interested, he wanted a good way to torture her 
back 
> for what ever she had in mind fo him.  
> >  
> > Hellplague was not too far away.  Far enough to be out of sight, 
> close enough to hear the conversation.  She fought the urge o run 
up 
> behind him and pummel him, but she also just wanted to be around 
> him.  A strange thought indeed for a Minion.  She pushed hat aside 
> and began linking the sensors on Malice's body to a computer 
panel.  
> She intialized the connection and something bizarre happened.  
> Malice went rigid, emitted a pained groan, then completely shut 
> down.  Hellplague ran in after she was recieving no info on 
Malice's 
> body.
> > "What happened?  What did you do to him?" she demanded as she 
> tried to awake Malice to no avail.
> >  
> > OOC: Did you get the email applying my new character yet? 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare::
> > 
> > "It's your life Hellplague not mine"said sacastically the femme
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Malice:
> > >  
> > > "Well no one asked you, now did they?" Hellplague said as she 
> > stepped in front of Malice and placed some small sensors on 
> Malice's 
> > face, head and on various locations all over his body.  She 
turned 
> > to Necross and splattercannon and told them to pull him to his 
> feet 
> > as she lessened the gravity holding him down.  The males obeyed 
> and 
> > pulled Malice up roughly.  The bounty hunter leaned against 
> > Splattercannon as the sudden climbing to his feet made him a 
> little 
> > light headed.  He stood up straight and tried to look behind 
him, 
> > because he couldn't see that mischevious Hellplague and that was 
> > cause for worry.  The Sweep commander shoo-ed away Necross and 
> > Splattercannon as she wrapped her arms around Malice's waist.   
> The 
> > males obeyed with hesitation, while Necross left the room 
> entirely, 
> > Splattercannon took position by the door.  Malice looked at the 
> arms 
> > around his waist and looked back at the femme biehind him.  It 
was 
> > at this time he actually noticed, she was kinda pretty.  She 
looked
> > >  like a Generation One Decepticon, only with no insignia.  But 
> the 
> > though passed out of his mind as quickly as it entered.
> > > "'Scuse me, but I fel I must tell you something.  I'm taken.  
A 
> > little Maxi down there is waiting on me."
> > > The Minion did not speak, but walked around in front of 
Malice, 
> > her arms still around his waist.  
> > > "Well she's down there, and I'm right here in front of you.  
> > Besides, I can offer you more than that Maximal-"
> > > "Maxitron actually," the hunter corrected,"it seems she was 
> dumped 
> > here on accident while dealing with her universe's Unicron." he 
> > added with a grin.
> > > "Whatever.  It doesn't matter, my pet WILL come around and 
> accept 
> > me.  Blacknightmare-" Hellplague said as she let go of Malice 
and 
> > shoved him back to the bed,"Make him 'comfortable'." she said 
with 
> a 
> > seductive grin.
> > > "I need to ready some equipment then we can begin." 
> >
